mapper.update: update wedding set applicant_id = #{applicantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, applicant_id, name, phone, email, total, location, detail, state from wedding
